entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet flurries changing to flurries at times heavy this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
